page.title: 05CHANGES IN THE HOMES OF RHU.
page.content: With changing life_styles comes the need to alter the style of homes.With the ever_increasing cost of maintaining and running the mansion houses,many have been converted either to form hotels or other institutions such as homes for the elderly or children,however at present, of the two children's homes we had in our area,one closed down 3 years ago and there are plans to close the other, Blairvadach, in the near future as the trend is for children to be fostered rather than institutionalised.Many of the cottages,whilst retaining their original character,have been modernised and some of the villas have been split into upper and lower flats. The development of the Faslane Naval Base has also led to the building of an estate of terraced;semi_detached and detached houses and maisonettes.
